data.eml:eml: A new species of Micromaldane (Polychaeta: Maldanidae) from the Falkland Islands, southwestern Atlantic, with notes on reproduction

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Darbyshire, Teresa (2013): A new species of Micromaldane (Polychaeta: Maldanidae) from the Falkland Islands, southwestern Atlantic, with notes on reproduction. Zootaxa 3683 (4): 439-446, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3683.4.7
